Smart Socks - Socks with built-in sensors that track foot temperature, pressure, and sweat levels to provide real-time feedback on foot health and athletic performance. (Confidence Score: 0.8/1)
Glow-in-the-Dark Socks - Socks with special fabric that absorbs light and emits a soft glow in the dark, providing a unique and fun way to add some magic to any outfit. (Confidence Score: 0.7/1)
Healing Socks - Socks infused with herbs and essential oils that promote healing and reduce inflammation, perfect for people with foot injuries or chronic conditions. (Confidence Score: 0.9/1)
Scented Socks - Socks with a built-in scent diffuser that releases a pleasant fragrance throughout the day, providing a refreshing and invigorating experience. (Confidence Score: 0.8/1)

Sock Puppets - Socks with built-in puppet theaters that allow the wearer to create and perform their own puppet shows, providing a fun and creative outlet for kids and adults alike. (Confidence Score: 0.9/1)
